question: I get mad and want to cry every night?
question_content:
Every night I have school the next day I get mad and want to cry and yell. 
I'm 16 and a girl. I'm a junior in High school and get pretty good grades.
I don't really like school much. 
I have lots of friends and people I'm cool with.

Could this be a serious problem? Or it's just me? 
It's weird and amazing how mad I get. I just don't like the thought of that.

answers.answer_content: I used to feel the same when I was 16, must be hormonal changes.  Are you about to get your period? Does it happen everyday? What about on the weekends? Perhaps you should try meditating and appreciating everything you have, think about so many poor teenagers in poor countries like Africa who have to care for their siblings because their parents died.  They would give everything to have your life.  Be grateful!

i use to feel like that specially on sunday nights when i have to attend school in the morning
just dont think about it , u will soon finish and hopefully get a descent job
